context.name: David Robinson
context.bio: Along with Flames Consulting Group, David interned at Flagstar Bank last summer and is involved in other on-campus organizations such as the Black Tech Scholars, Alpha Kappa Psi Business Professional Organization, and Business Scholars. Outside of school, he’s involved with the Urban Tech Academy, is interested in CyberSecurity and loves playing basketball and Super Smash Bros. He plans to intern for Deloitte this summer.
